# Data prep

## Load data 
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(sp)
```

```{r}
div <- readRDS("./data/full_panel.RDS")
cty <- readRDS("./data/county.RDS")
state <- readRDS("./data/states.RDS")
s.layer <- list("sp,.polygons", state, col = "gray") 
ccp_cty <- merge(cty, ccp, by="GEOID", all = F)
```

# Prep data 
```{r}
div <- subset(div, select=c(GEOID, YEAR, SDI_AG))
div_sum <- div %>% group_by(YEAR) %>% mutate(avg = mean(SDI_AG))
```

# Plot data 
```{r}
SDI_overall <- ggplot(div_sum, aes(x=YEAR, y=avg))+
  geom_line()+
  geom_smooth(method=lm , color="red", fill="#69b3a2", se=TRUE) +
  scale_y_log10() + 
  #xlim("2008","2017")+
  theme_minimal()
SDI_overall
```
